fields.name: txtTaxPayerName
fields.title: Name(s) shown on return - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxPayerSSN
fields.title: Identifying number - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtRentCdtsWksh1
fields.title: Part I Passive Activity Credits Caution: If you have credits from a publicly traded partnership, see Publicly Traded Partnerships (PTPs) in the instructions. Credits From Rental Real Estate Activities With Active Participation (Other Than Rehabilitation Credits and Low-Income Housing Credits) (See Lines 1a through 1c in the instructions. ) 1(a) Credits from Worksheet 1, column (a)

fields.name: txtPryrUnallowCdts1
fields.title: Line 1b, Prior year unallowed credits from Worksheet 1, column (b)

fields.name: txtSumWksh1Cdts
fields.title: Line 1c, Add lines 1a and 1b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtRentCdtsWksh2
fields.title: Rehabilitation Credits From Rental Real Estate Activities and Low-Income Housing Credits for Property Placed in Service Before 1990 (or From Pass-Through Interests Acquired Before 1990)(See Lines 2a through 2c in the instructions. )Line 2a, Credits from Worksheet 2, column (a)

fields.name: txtPryrUnallowCdts2
fields.title: Line 2b, Prior year unallowed credits from Worksheet 2, column (b)

fields.name: txtSumWksh2Cdts
fields.title: Line 2c, Add lines 2a and 2b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtRentCdtsWksh3
fields.title: Low-Income Housing Credits for Property Placed in Service After 1989 (See Lines 3a through 3c in the instructions. )Line 3a, Credits from Worksheet 3, column (a)

fields.name: txtPryrUnallowCdts3
fields.title: Line 3b, Prior year unallowed credits from Worksheet 3, column (b)

fields.name: txtSumWksh3Cdts
fields.title: Line 3c, Add lines 3a and 3b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtAllOtherCdts
fields.title: All Other Passive Activity Credits (See Lines 4a through 4c in the instructions. )Line 4a, Credits from Worksheet 4, column (a)

fields.name: txtPryrUnallowCdts4
fields.title: Line 4b, Prior year unallowed credits from Worksheet 4, column (b)

fields.name: txtSumWksh4Cdts
fields.title: Line 4c, Add lines 4a and 4b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumAllCdts
fields.title: Line 5. Add lines 1c, 2c, 3c, and 4c - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxNetPassinc
fields.title: Line 6. Enter the tax attributable to net passive income (see instructions)

fields.name: txtTotNetCdt
fields.title: Line 7. Subtract line 6 from line 5. If line 6 is more than or equal to line 5, enter -0- and see instructions - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP2SmallCrdAmt
fields.title: Part II Special Allowance for Rental Real Estate Activities With Active Participation. Line 8. Enter the smaller of line 1c or line 7 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP2MaxAmtSepOther
fields.title: Part II Special Allowance for Rental Real Estate Activities With Active Participation Note: Complete this part only if you have an amount on line 1c. Otherwise, go to Part III. Line 9, Enter $150, 000. If married filing separately, see instructions

fields.name: txtP2ModiAgi
fields.title: Line 10, Enter modified adjusted gross income, but not less than zero (see instructions). If line 10 is equal to or more than line 9, skip lines 11 through 15 and enter -0- on line 16

fields.name: txtP2SubSepOtherAgi
fields.title: Line 11, Subtract line 10 from line 9 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP2MulSepOtherAgi
fields.title: Line 12, Multiply line 11 by 50% (. 50). Do not enter more than $25, 000. If married filing separately, see instructions

fields.name: txtP28582P2Amt
fields.title: Line 13a, Enter the amount, if any, from line 10 of Form 8582

fields.name: txtP28582P3Amt
fields.title: Line 13b, Enter the amount, if any, from line 14 of Form 8582

fields.name: txtP2Add8582Amt
fields.title: Line 13c, Add lines 13a and 13b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP2SubMulsepagi8582
fields.title: Line 14, Subtract line 13c from line 12 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP2TaxAttribAmt
fields.title: Line 15, Enter the tax attributable to the amount on line 14 (see instructions)

fields.name: txtP2PassActCrdAllowed
fields.title: Line 16, Enter the smaller of line 8 or line 15 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3P1FinalAmt
fields.title: Part III - Special Allowance for Rehabilitation Credits From Rental Real Estate Activities and Low-Income Housing Credits for Property Placed in Service Before 1990. Line 17. Enter the amount from line 7 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3P2FinalAmt
fields.title: Line 18, Enter the amount from line 16 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3SubP1P2FinalAmt
fields.title: Line 19, Subtract line 18 from line 17. If zero, enter -0- here and on lines 30 and 36, and then go to Part V - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3SmallWksh2P1P2Amt
fields.title: Line 20, Enter the smaller of line 2c or line 19 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3MaxAmtSepOther
fields.title: Line 21, Enter $250, 000. If married filing separately, see instructions to find out if you can skip lines 21 through 26

fields.name: txtP3ModiAgi
fields.title: Line 22, Enter modified adjusted gross income, but not less than zero. (See instructions for line 10. ) If line 22 is equal to or more than line 21, skip lines 23 through 29 and enter -0- on line 30 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3SubSepOtherAgi
fields.title: Line 23, Subtract line 22 from line 21 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3MulSepOtherAgi
fields.title: Line 24, Multiply line 23 by 50% (. 50). Do not enter more than $25, 000. If married filing separately, see instructions

fields.name: txtP38582P2Amt
fields.title: Line 25a, Enter the amount, if any, from line 10 of Form 8582

fields.name: txtP38582P3Amt
fields.title: Line 25b, Enter the amount, if any, from line 14 of Form 8582

fields.name: txtP3Add8582Amt
fields.title: Line 25c, Add lines 25a and 25b - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3SubMulsepagi8582
fields.title: Line 26, Subtract line 25c from line 24 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3TaxAttribAmt
fields.title: Line 27, Enter the tax attributable to the amount on line 26 (see instructions)

fields.name: txtP3AmtFromP2
fields.title: Line 28, Enter the amount, if any, from line 18 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3SubTaxamtFromP2
fields.title: Line 29, Subtract line 28 from line 27 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP3PassActCrdAllowed
fields.title: Line 30, Enter the smaller of line 20 or line 29 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP4AmtfrmP3OrSubP1P2
fields.title: Part 4 Special Allowance for Low-Income Housing Credits for Property Placed in Service After 1989 Note: Complete this part only if you have an amount on line 3c. Otherwise, go to Part 5. Line 31, If you completed Part III, enter the amount from line 19. Otherwise, subtract line 16 from line 7

fields.name: txtP4AmtFrmP3
fields.title: Line 32, Enter the amount from line 30  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP4SubAmtfrp3P3Orp1P2
fields.title: Line 33, Subtract line 32 from line 31. If zero, enter -0- here and on line 36 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP4SmallP1SubVal
fields.title: Enter the smaller of line 3c or line 33 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtP4TaxAttribAmt
fields.title: Line 35, Tax attributable to the remaining special allowance (see instructions)

fields.name: txtP4PassActCrdAllowed
fields.title: Line 36, Enter the smaller of line 34 or line 35 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPassActCdt
fields.title: Part 5, Passive Activity Credit Allowed. Add lines 6, 16, 30, and 36. See instructions to find out how to report the allowed credit on your tax return and how to allocate allowed and unallowed credits if you have more than one credit or credits from more than one activity. - This field is automatically calculated for you

options.label: Part 5, Election To Increase Basis of Credit Property. Line 38, If you disposed of your entire interest in a passive activity or former passive activity in a fully taxable transaction, and you elect to increase your basis in credit property used in that activity by the unallowed credit that reduced your basis in the property, check this box. See instructions

fields.name: txtNamePassActDisp
fields.title: Line 39, Name of passive activity disposed of

fields.name: txtDecripCdtProp
fields.title: Line 40, Description of the credit property for which the election is being made

fields.name: txtDecripCdtProp1
fields.title: Line 40, Description of the credit property for which the election is being made Continued

fields.name: txtAmtUnallowCdt
fields.title: Line 41, Amount of unallowed credit that reduced your basis in the property
